actions.text: Amendment SA 5112 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 5112 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Domenici. To provide appropriation authorization for grants to improve the commercial value of forest biomass for electric energy, useful heat, transportation fuels, and other commercial purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5112 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Domenici.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5112 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

purpose: To provide appropriation authorization for grants to improve the commercial value of forest biomass for electric energy, useful heat, transportation fuels, and other commercial purposes.
